name: StupidRagdolls!!
description:
shoot ragdolls!

WIP

more updates are gunna be added later 

v: add force to ragdolls upwards

R: reset  ragolls to the middle of map

e:HELLICOPTER HELLICOPTER

k: spawn new ragdolls

b:respawn self

left mouse: shoot

thats about it, have fun!
